rewrite1:
Please apply the following formatting changes to the specified paragraphs in your Word document:

- In the sixth paragraph, alter the text color to the hexadecimal code #FAFAD2 and increase the font size to 16 points.

- For the fifth paragraph, set the line spacing to double. Then, introduce an 8 point space before the paragraph begins. Proceed to select Arial as the font type and color the font using the hexadecimal code #FFFF00.

- Moving on to the fourth paragraph, add a space of 0.5 lines before it starts. After the paragraph, leave a space of 1.5 cm. Amplify the font size to 48 points, and apply a highlight with the hexadecimal color #FF00FF.
